hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Boss Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a solitary #Cow#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Magic Meter#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Did you know that ReDead mourn their defeated friends?

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Back Left Bombable Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path First Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Din's Fire# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern End of Bridge Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that Morpha is easily trapped in a corner.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Magic Beans# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #2 Deku Scrubs#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #1# major item.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path of time.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Hookshot#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Magic Meter#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #10# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Kokiri Shop#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern Spinning Scythe Silver Rupee Icicles

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Stick Capacity# and #a Huge Rupee#.
